metadata.title: IT Support Specialist Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for IT Support Specialist positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with experience in providing technical support and troubleshooting IT issues. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: IT Support Specialist
achievements: Resolved over 500+ technical issues per month for end-users, increasing satisfaction scores by 20%.
Implemented a new ticketing system that reduced response times by 30%.
Assisted in training new team members on troubleshooting best practices.

experience.title: Junior IT Support Technician
achievements: Provided remote and on-site support to over 200 clients, improving average resolution time by 15%.
Contributed to knowledge base articles that enhanced team efficiency by 10%.
Collaborated with network engineers on major infrastructure upgrade projects.

experience.title: IT Support Assistant
achievements: Assisted in setting up and maintaining over 1000 workstations, achieving a system uptime of 99.9%.
Managed software installations and updates, enhancing workstation stability.
Received Employee of the Month award for exceptional customer service and technical skills.

projects.name: Remote Support Process Automation
projects.description: Developed automated scripts to streamline repetitive tasks, reducing manual effort by 25%.
